net.proteusframework.ui.search

Class ActionColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.search.SearchResultColumnImpl
      • net.proteusframework.ui.search.ActionColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, SearchResultColumn

    public class ActionColumn
extends SearchResultColumnImpl
    Column that includes text buttons for operations such as View, Edit, Copy, and Remove. This uses a FixedValueColumn for its MTableColumn by default.
    Author:
    Greg Dick (greg@i2rd.com)
